name: Custom Stock Balance Report
query:
SELECT 
    bin.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
    item.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:150",
    bin.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150",
    
    SUM(bin.valuation_rate * bin.actual_qty) AS "Stock Value:Currency:120",
    SUM(bin.actual_qty) AS "Boxes:Float:100",

    IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(sn.custom_weight) 
        FROM `tabSerial No` sn 
        WHERE sn.item_code = bin.item_code
        AND sn.warehouse = bin.warehouse
        AND sn.status = 'Active'
    ), 0) AS "Weights:Float:120",

    IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(sn.custom_length) 
        FROM `tabSerial No` sn 
        WHERE sn.item_code = bin.item_code
        AND sn.warehouse = bin.warehouse
        AND sn.status = 'Active'
    ), 0) AS "Meters:Float:120"

FROM 
    `tabBin` bin
JOIN 
    `tabItem` item ON bin.item_code = item.name
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabBOM` bom ON bom.item = bin.item_code AND bom.is_default = 1

WHERE 
    item.item_group = 'Products' OR bom.item IS NOT NULL

GROUP BY 
    bin.item_code, item.item_group, bin.warehouse

HAVING
    SUM(bin.actual_qty) != 0
    OR IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(sn.custom_weight) 
        FROM `tabSerial No` sn 
        WHERE sn.item_code = bin.item_code
        AND sn.warehouse = bin.warehouse
        AND sn.status = 'Active'
    ), 0) != 0
    OR IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(sn.custom_length) 
        FROM `tabSerial No` sn 
        WHERE sn.item_code = bin.item_code
        AND sn.warehouse = bin.warehouse
        AND sn.status = 'Active'
    ), 0) != 0

ORDER BY 
    bin.item_code, bin.warehouse;
